inn1.comm: solidly behind the back of a length ball on off stump
sweet timing! The bowler errs by offering some width and Perera was set up on the back foot and punches through point. Opened the face on impact and pierced the gap perfectly
jabs it through point again! Mashrafe doesn't learn as he offers up a short ball outside off. Kusal is on the back foot again, a little deeper, and cuts away
shortish, but this time he tucks him up on middle and leg. Kusal is on his toes and blocks
fuller and slides this across the left-hander, Kusal is circumspect and leaves this time
nice and full on middle and off, Kusal is wary as he presents a straight bat
fullish and angled in on off stump, Dilshan drives into the off side
opens the face a little more as he tries to pierce the gap in the covers. Not enough timing
back of a length on and around off stump, gets on the back foot and blocks under his eyes
he's thrown the stumps down at the non-strikers' but Dilshan has judged this single very well. Dabbed the length ball into the midwicket region with soft hands and raced off

cut straight into the hands of point! Might have been a bit more bounce there than he expected. Still slams it away and Shamsur has held on to a pretty sharp catch! It was short and wide, probably one of the worse balls he would bowl to get a wicket but Rubel doesn't mind. Neither does Bangladesh as they rejoice after the early success
good length ball, pushed across his off stump. Sanga lets it go
good length ball, kept in the corridor outside off. Not bothered with

just a hint more bounce than normal and Dilshan has been hit on his right thumb. Reared up at him while he was looking to clip into square leg, but this pitch still has enough moisture to make the ball misbehave. The physio is out there as Dilshan is wringing his hand. He's in quite some pain here
back of a length and slides one down the pads, Dilshan seems to have recovered well enough as he clips to long leg
gorgeous timing from Sanga. Takes advantage of a length ball on the pads with a lovely flick of the wrists. Sends the ball scurrying away through square leg
terrific fielding from Gazi. This has much room as Dilshan could possibly want and he strode forward and drills it into the covers. Gazi dives full length to his left and saves at least three runs

miss your mark once, you can get away. Do it twice in a row and Dilshan will say thank you very much. Short and wide, he was on the front foot and flayed it through point. Didn't bother keeping it down as he found the gap to perfection
good length ball on off stump, Sanga blocks it off the front foot
change of pace from Rubel, almost deceived the batsman but Sanga waits on the front foot and pushes to mid-off
fuller and outside off, Sanga covers off stump and shoulders arms

take that! A pull shot is usually associated with more power than that, but Sanga just taps this away after getting on top of the bounce. Swiveled on the back foot and pulls it down through midwicket and the timing is amazing
back of a length and tucking him up, Sanga clips into the leg side and hustles through for a couple
fuller and pushed across outside off, Sanga watches it go through to the keeper

definite signs of extra bounce off this pitch. This was on the off stump corridor and had Dilshan pressing forward. But it hits a length and leaps off the deck. The batsman did well to drop his wrists and let it sail across his nose as he swayed inside the line
nudged into the midwicket region as this is on middle
shuffles across his stumps to defends down the pitch
fullish on off stump, Sanga moved right across as he exposes leg stump and blocks
half-volley on off stump, Sanga doesn't do much more than push it down the ground and pick up a single to the left of mid-off
length ball draws him forward and Dilshan drives on the up. Short cover runs to his right and gets to it
good length ball on off stump which Sanga punches to point off the back foot
clipped away behind square leg as this is shortish and on leg stump
fuller and pitched wide of off stump, Sanga leans forward and drives to mid-off. Doesn't time it as well as he usually does
back of a length and just outside off, Sanga's shuffle gets him in line and blocks
driven past mid-off. This time he adds a bit more power into his overpitched delivery and mid-off's dive is not good enough
length ball on off, strides forward and blocks. More of an inside edge though
ducks back in off the pitch and this seems to have got a bit more bounce again. The movement beats the flick and Dilshan gets hit on the thigh
fuller on off stump, Dilshan was forward and nudges wide of mid-on and takes off. Just about makes it before Mushi's throw
fullish and just outside off, Sanga is forward and blocks
full and on the pads, neatly clipped through midwicket
darts back in again, seems to be the off cutter and it gripped the pitch nicely too. Beats Dilshan's flick again as the ball runs away off the thigh pad
on the pads to Sanga this time, who has no trouble working this away through square leg
back of a length around the off stump, stays back in his crease and blocks

threads this through the covers. He is classy when he plays that cover drive of his. Took it on the up just a little bit, but his front foot had gone towards he line of the ball and his hands came through the line quite nicely. Lovely timing and placement from Sanga
back of a length and on the pads, possibly to correct himself, but Sanga works it through square leg this time

goes for a pull and he gets a leading edge to mid-off. Rubel roars! It was not short enough to pull, especially when he was on the front foot. He didn't have enough room to free his hands either. Another failure for Dilshan as he dies by the sword. I wonder how much that blow to his thumb contributed to his dismissal.
fullish on middle and leg, Chandimal blocks with a straight bat to mid-on
back of a length on off stump, punched to mid-off
fuller and just a touch outside off, Sanga opens the face and caresses into the covers
shuffles across as he waits for this slower ball and guides it to third man
full and angled in, Chandimal looks reasonably compact as he pushes to mid-on
uses the angle to better profit this time. Mashrafe's been on the pads a little too much this afternoon, and the batsman whips it away behind square leg
back of a good length, Sanga is forward and he blocks
thumped away behind point and Sanga has another crisp boundary to his name. Takes advantage of a bit of room outside off as he cuts well behind point. Third man is too fine to stop that
back of a length outside off, Chandimal is on the back foot and punches to short cover
wokrs it away between midwicket and mid-on. Terrible fielding by Mashrafe who dives over the ball in trying to rein it in and Chandimal has run three! Brilliant hustling
on the pads and Sanga whips it away off his hips to square leg
rocks back and waits on the short ball and cuts behind point. Well-controlled stroke from Chandimal
strides confidently forward and pushes the fuller length ball outside off down the ground
good length ball on and around off stump, Chandimal blocks into the off side
flighted on off stump and it straightens just a tad, Sanga keeps it out
tossed up quite nicely on off stump and Sanga defends off the front foot
charges down the track but Gazi has spotted him and pulls his length back. There is a bit of turn here as well but Sanga is comfortable as he dabs it into the leg side
gives it away with a fuller delivery on the pads and Sanga works it away square
length ball outside off, Chandimal moves across and punches to midwicket
tossess it up to draw him forward and Chandimal nudges to midwicket. Was playing a little too early as the ball goes uppishly, but falls well short
flighted on off stump, comes forward and drives to mid-off. Races across to snare the single
chips down the track to reach the pitch of this one flighted outside off and clips it to the right of mid-on
goes down the track again, but this one wasn't tossed up. Pushes back to the bowler
strays down the leg side and Sanga looks to take advantage with a sweep. Only gets a glove
switches back over this time and this was tossed up on off stump, seemed to grip on the pitch a little more as Sanga's flick is mistimed. Goes uppishly but into no-man's land in front of mid-on
advances as he pushes this flighted ball down the ground to mid-on
he played that so late. Went deep in the crease as he saw this just a bit short and outside off and carved it behind point with an angled bat
flighted on middle and off, strides forward and pushes to long-off
goes back to this length ball and allows it to turn and clips to midwicket

that's a dolly to midwicket and Gazi has struck! This flighted delivery stopped on the pitch and came at him a lot slower than he expected. Chandimal's closed face of the bat results in a leading edge which is pouched with the greatest ease
flighted on off stump, but he remains on the back foot and nudges towards square leg

again prefers to play off the back foot to a tossed up delivery on off stump. I think he was opening the face of his bat to beat slip. But it goes straight to the man. Lucky for him though that it fell short
gives it some air as he angles it on off stump, goes down the track and pads up
flighted on off as he draws the batsman forward into a defensive
another little trip down the track as he looks to defend and gets struck on the front pad. Bit of an appeal, but he had advanced far enough to make the umpire shake his head
chips it over the top and Bangladesh cry "catch it!" That was a dangerous little shot as he had strode down the track and lobbed it towards long-off. Fell just short
turns right across him as this is tossed up on middle and leg. Sanga lets it through to the keeper
flighted on and around leg stump as he keeps it out
another length ball which turns too far down the leg side, Sanga leaves
that was close. He was advancing again, but the length was pulled back and he gets an inside edge onto pad
goes back and chops it to short third man
goes back and pulls quite hard and there is a man at deep square leg, who rushes across to his left and dives full length. Gets both hands to it but it spills out. Very difficult chance there
flighted on off stump, pushes down the ground to long-off
lunges forward to the pitch of this flighted offspinner and opens the face to guide to point
lovely line and length from Gazi as he turns this from off stump, clipped to square leg
just a little short enough to enable him to work it down the short fine leg. He is well and truly waiting on the back foot
slows it down quite nicely as this is flighted on middle, Priyanjan is forward as he blocks
flighted on and around off stump, keeps it out
stays back on this good length ball on the stumps and blocks
defends down the pitch as he strides forward to the flighted delivery on the stumps
goes back and gets this to turn from middle off a length, defended
targets off stump but Priyanjan goes back and answers with a straight bat and that is drinks
stays back to this length ball on off stump and pushes it down to long-on
stays back as he rides what little turn is there and clips past midwicket
hint of width on this as he rocks back and cuts to point
touch more bounce and he does well, softening his grip and nudges it behind square leg
more turn into the leg side as this is full and on the stumps, turns it to square leg off the back foot
tossed up on off stump but Priyanjan prefers the safety of his crease as he blocks off the back foot
tossed up outside off as Sanga is forward and clips it through midwicket. Bit of turn there as well
short and wide, but Priyanjan is unable to capitalise. Cuts it to the right of point but Sunny dives and parries it
tossed up and drifts in on middle, he goes back and presents a straight bat. Wary of the little bit of turn away there
skips down the track to reach the pitch and pushes into the covers
stays back as this is fuller on middle and off, defended. He's 3 off 26
flighted on off stump, defended to mid-off off the front foot. More and more pressure piling on him
pushed to long-off
length ball on off stump, looks for a slog sweep but only manages to heave it away as far as short fine leg. It was in the air too, but it doesn't carry
tossed up on middle and leg, nudges through midwicket off the back foot
length ball on offstump, goes back and punches down the ground to long-off

much needed release for Priyanjan as he rocks back to this shorter ball outside off and cuts through point. The fielder races after it and pulls out a dive, but it is not enough. The third umpire confirms as much
nicely tossed up on off stump as he shuffles down the track and whips to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, Sanga presents a straight bat and pushes to long-on
comes down the track, but Shakib has slowed this up and pulled his length back too. Priyanjan adjusts and defends
dropped too short, guess he was afraid of the batsman advancing. Priyanjan has rocked back and cuts to deep point
perfect placement and Sanga knew that is all he had to do with this sweep shot. It was tossed up outside leg and he swung the bat down on the ball and kept it all alone the ground
flighted on and around middle, nudged to midwicket
another sweep, this one a lot squarer but still just as well struck. There is protection in the deep though
worked away to deep midwicket and they jog through for a single
was setting up for a big strike there, slog sweep. But then he realises this is too well flighted and was too tight on the stumps. Manages to keep it out
flighted on the stumps, defended into the midwicket region
drags it too short and Priyanjan was waiting on the back foot and mauls it behind square leg. Didn't bother keeping the ball down as he finds the gap to the right of deep square leg
stays back and a little leg side of this length ball and pushes into the covers
fifty for Sanga, with the most unobtrusive of pushes down the ground to long-off. He's been the glue holding Sri Lanka up again, 84th ODI fifty
that's a quick single, dabs it just in front of cover and sprints through
tossed up on and around off stump, Priyanjan was down the track and defends
short again and he has got into excellent position to pull this away as well. This time it was in front of square
goes down the track and pushes into the midwicket region. Good flight from Shakib
gives it a little more air just outside off and Priyanjan is almost down on one knee as he drills through the covers
length ball turning in on off stump, goes back and punches to cover

way too full and way too close to cut and there is a loud, loud appeal for caught behind. Gorgeous flight from Sunny off his very first ball, but it was the bat hitting the top flap of the pad that made the sound
fullish on off stump, but he still prefers to defend from deep in the crease
and if he goes forward, he chips down the track. Reaches the pitch and just nudged it to mid-on
excellent fielding by Shakib at backward point. Dives to his left as this was cut. Short and a bit of width on this and should have been put away
good length ball pushed in on middle, nudged away to midwicket
stays leg side of this and punches into the covers off the back foot
good length ball outside off, Sanga goes back and punches to long-on.
flighted on middle and draws him out of his crease, but Priyanjan can only push back to the bowler
advances again as he turns this flighted delivery into a full toss and pushes to long-off
opens the face as he guides this tossed up delivery behind point
tries to use his wrists and find the gap past midwicket as he comes down the track again. Doesn't succeed
advances again, but can only pad it away into the leg side as Shakib darts a fuller ball in at him
worked away to deep midwicket as this is tossed up on his pads

dances down the track and yorks himself as he looks to whip through midwicket. Gets an inside edge onto pad and dribbles away into the leg side. Sanga knows there is a single on the offing and calls his partner. who had no idea where the ball is, through
short and down the leg side, terrible delivery and Sanga pounces on it. On the back foot and pulls to the long leg boundary.
goes around now as this is flighted on off stump, Sanga goes back and neatly clips it through to deep midwicket
good length ball on middle as Priyanjan goes back and dead bats it

he's almost chopped it on! Was moving down the track again, but Shakib knows his game by now and fires this in flat. He was rather late bringing his bat down and is lucky to have got any wood on it. Sanga was looking for the quick single again, but short third man is too quick
good length ball on off stump, dabbed into the off side as he waits on the off cutter
this length ball slides down leg and he clips to long leg
punches to long-off as he stands up tall to this back of a length ball on off stump
fullish on off stump, Priyanjan defends with an open face. Very little footwork there as well
good length ball on middle and leg, Priyanjan defends to the right of the bowler

length ball on off stump as he looks to get on top of the bounce and whip through midwicket, only manages to push it down the ground. Mashrafe dives to his right on his followthrough and parries the ball to mid-on.
that time his trip down the pitch proves dividends. Reaches the pitch and is confident enough to whip it over midwicket. Lovely wristwork from Priyanjan
this is a touch shortish on off stump, goes back and taps it behind point for a quick single. Nicely done
length ball outside off, driven to long-on off the back foot
was venturing down the track again and Sunny shortens his length and pushes him back. Defended into the covers
a bit too short and wide there as Priyanjan was on the back foot waiting for it. Cut away to the deep, but there is protection
advances as he looks to defend this flighted ball. Gets struck on the front pad
cut away behind point as Masrafe bowls this short and wide. Deep third man does well, making good ground
back of a length outside off, Sanga stands up tall and punches through the covers and picks up a well-timed double
this was full and had a bit of room outside off, Sanga was forward and drives through the covers
length ball slides down leg. Priyanjan looks to flick, but can't connect
fuller length angled in at him, Priyanjan dabs to midwicket
slower off cutter and he was almost beaten. Only half forward and he was playing away from the body. The top hand came off as he drives to mid-off
length ball just outside off as he goes right back and guides to point using the angled face of the bat
continues around as this is on a length and on the pads, clips away to deep backward square leg
slides on with the arm and he hasn't picked it. Goes down the track and is struck on the top flap of the front pad
stayed back to a fuller deliver which skids on with the arm again, just manages to chip it square on the off side
charges down the track and slogs it over midwicket, went through with the shot whatever this one would have done and Sanga is seen talking him to him, guiding him along
flighted on off, defended off the back foot
bit of width outside off and he slices this behind point and has placed it wonderfully well. Got forward to get as close to the flight as possible and did quite well
flighted on off stump, driven back to the bowler
loads of flight as he drifts this in on leg stump, Sanga eases it down to mid-on
shortish with a bit of room, Sanga rocks back and cuts in front of point
tossed up outside off, Priyanjan comes forward and defends into the covers and scurries through for a quick single
easily driven to long-off as he strides out to meet this tossed up ball at it's pitch
just a bit short as Priyanjan makes a bit of room on the back foot and punches into the covers
good length ball angling across, clipped into midwicket
he's latched onto that. Superb timing from Sanga again as he got hold of this short ball on middle and off with a magnificent pull shot
shortish on middle and off again as Sanga pulls to deep backwards square leg again. Mominul is rather slow out there and they sneak an extra run. Brilliantly spotted by Sanga
dabbed to third man as this is shortish and outside off
back of a length and it is angled in at him. Priyanjan is back in his crease and punches into the covers
digs it into the middle of the deck and this rises a little too high over the batsman's head
stays back to this short ball outside off and opens the face to find deep third man
tossed up on off stump as he lunges forward and defends on off stump
punched to cover as this is just a touch short and just outside off
flighted outside off, pushed back to the bowler
stays back to this length ball and clips it to deep backwards square leg
flighted on off stump, Sanga drives towards mid-off, but Mushi intervenes from short cover.
flighted on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
pitched up on middle, pushed down to long-on for a single
pitched up on middle, pushed down to long-on
comes down the track and flicks to the leg side for one more
slightly shorter, turned to deep midwicket for one
stays back and waits for the delivery to turn and cuts to deep cover for two
full toss flicked to the leg side for one
back of length outside off, tucked to the midwicket area for one
full on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
helped to backward square leg with the turn and Priyanjan completes his fifty
comes down and drives to long-off for a single
slightly short of length, paddle swept to short fine leg and he doe well to stop the four runs
slightly short and wide, cut off the backfoot for one
flighted around off, pushed down towards long-on for one
goes on the backfoot and tucks to deep midwicket for one
uses his feet and flicks it to deep midwicket from off
takes a step down, slightly slower delivery pushed to long-on
flatter and outside off, he wanted to cut but missed
length delivery towards off, pushed to the covers and the bowler chases it to save a single and it's drinks
full on the pads, flicked to midwicket for one
turns in a bit from outside off, Priyanjan poked but missed
comes down this time and turns it from off to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, driven down easily to long-on
flighted outside off and Priyanjan comes down to drive it beautifully through the covers for a four
uses his feet again and drives towards point for one
shortens his length as he sees Priyanjan jumping down the track and he can only dab it into the covers
can't find the gap through point. Would be aggrieved as there was no one in the deep and this was rather short and wide
goes back as he makes some room for himself and cuts off the stumps

tossed up on middle as he looks to sweep. Gets struck low on the front pad and Shakib knew it as he went for the appeal! This one slides on with the arm and hits him in front of off stump as Priyanjan tried to get outside the line. Wasn't too successful
punched to long-on as this was on a length and on middle
flighted on middle and leg, driven to long-on
punched down the ground to long-on. This wason a length and on the stumps
flighted on middle as he waits on his front foot and turns it around to short fine leg
clipped away with the turn as this is darted in shortish on middle and off. Deep midwicket is quick enough to keep it to one
tossed up on off stump, driven back to the bowler
flighted outside off as he goes forward and drives to cover
gets it off the inside half of the bat as he looked to push to long-off. Instead he runs through for a single to long-on
goes right through midwicket, sloppy work from the captain as Sanga moves into the 90s
flighted on middle and leg, Mathews nudges it to the left of midwicket
almost a yorker on off stump, Sanga digs it out to the bowler
gets forward and drives this one flighted on the pads to long-on
nicely bowled as he gives this a bit of air and gets it to drift on. Mathews is kept to a forward defensive
clipped but straight to midwicket as Shakib bowls full and on the pads
pushed to long-on. No risks here from Sanga as he approaches three-figures
skips down the track, but he can't beat midwicket
shortish and on the stumps as Mathews rocks back and powers it to long-on. Looks like he's just about reach to give it a go
that's very well bowled. Saw Sanga come down the track and he pushed this wider outside off. The batsman adjusts well as he pushes into the covers. But he had to reach out for that
rockas back and pulls the short ball to deep midwicket. "Catch it!" was the cry, but it fall short
clipped to deep midwicket as this is on a length and angled in at him
tossed up but Mathews is happy to go deep in his crease and whip it strongly to deep midwicket
around to the left-hander, flighted on middle as he nudges to square leg and sets off. It just seems too easy for him
charges at him and swings off his hips, but Sunny has pulled the length back. And with Mathews unable to reach the pitch of this, inside edges it onto his pads
nailed that one. It was dropped short and on leg stump. Mathews moved across and offered a clear view of his leg stump, but he manages great connection with the lap sweep
looks to cut from the stumps and gets an inside edge back to the bowler
lunges forward as this is tossed up outside off and muscles it through the covers
flighted on and around off stump, he strides down the track and pushes to long-on
goes right back in his crease as he clips it off middle to deep square leg. He's showing a lot of intent out there and his footwork is matching up
struck to the sweeper on the off side as this is bowled on a length
clears the ropes at deep midwicket after having raced down the track. He wasn't quite to the pitch but it was turning into his arc and though he was slogging, he was always hitting with the spin.
goes for the slog sweep, but doesn't connect properly. Gets an inside edge towards short fine leg
advances down the track, but he almost yorks himself. Drills the flighted ball outside off to midwicket

oh dear! He wanted the second and he might be struggling here. Nope, it that had been direct he would have been gone. This was short and wide and allowed the batsman to rock back and cuts into the deep. The third umpire first presses the wrong button and then signals "Not out" soon enough. The Dhaka crowd was beside themselves. They thought they had sneaked one!

holds his pose as he pounds this through extra and touches gloves with his captain to celebrate his century. He went past a 1000 runs against Bangladesh in the course of this innings and he caps it off by moving to three figures. Full and wide outside off, flayed away
touch too short and Sanga had made just a bit of room to dab it past the short third man fielder. Wonderfully placed boundary from Sanga. Took it from just outside off too
low full toss outside off and Sanga opens the blade but can't beat point
too full and too straight that time, Sanga whips him through to deep square leg
just about a yorker on off stump, Mathews keeps his front foot out of the way and drills through the covers

starts off with a slower ball, which has a bit of width. Mathews' timing is not there as he was trying to muscle the ball away. Plus I dont think he picked the change in pace. Nasir Hossain misfields at cover
slower ball yorker on middle and off, Sanga opened up his stance and slices this in front of point and he scurries through for a single. Brought his bat down perfectly in time to meet the slower ball
he's found the gap between deep midwicket and long-on! This one moves in at him as he came down the track, but the swing only helps Mathews placing the ball and his inherent power does the rest
pushes down to long-on to raise a very quick fifty partnership
it's Sanga's turn to slog to deep midwicket. Length ball draws him down the track and he swings away. Finds the fielder though

inside out and over wide long-off, one bounce four! What an imperious strike! It was full and on the stumps, Sanga makes some room for himself and gets under the ball and lofts it on its way. Sri Lanka are timing their charge so very well
has to sit back and watch a terrific stroke from the SL captain. Fires it in full and on leg stump, Mathews moves outside leg and powers it through the covers
darts it in on middle and leg, Mathews jumps down the track and pounds it past the bowler.
length ball angled in on and around leg stump, Mathews was moving away from his stumps and cuts to short third man. Looks up to see if Sanga can run and they pick up another quick single
almost a yorker on off stump, drilled back to the bowler
shortish and just outside off stump, goes back and flays it through extra cover. The fielder pulls out a desperate dive but this was placed and timed too well
pushes down to long-off as he went back in  his crease to the length ball on the stumps
scoops it right behind the keeper. Searches for the yorker and this ends up a full toss outside off, Sanga moves outside off and was waiting for it and he shovels it in the V behind him
charges him and Rubel slides the length ball wider of off stump. Sanga swings wildly and gets it off the toe and it flies to the left of the keeper
full and wide outside off as he slices it to deep point
yorker on leg stump, Mathews manages an inside edge past short fine leg, but deep square leg is fine enough to stop it

dropped it, it was a dolly too! Slower full toss on middle and leg, Mathews wanted to follow his batting partner and scoop it over his head, but does not time it anywhere near as good. He had picked out the only man in the area but Mahmudullah shells a very simple chance
yorker-length ball on middle as he digs it out down the ground
tries to cramp the batsman by bowling full and on the pads, Mathews whips it to deep midwicket

Mahmudullah has made amends immediately, snares a good, tumbling catch on the long-on boundary to dismiss Sanga. It was tossed up on leg stump, made him go down on one knee and he lofted it. Think he got under it a bit too much as this got more height than distance. Mahmudullah runs to his left and had his eyes on the ball all the way into both his hands
full toss on off stump, made so by Mathews charging him. The bowler gets a hand to it and ensures its a dot
tossed up on the stumps as he moves outside leg and drills an extra-cover drive. Mahmudullah has a lot of work to do and is up for it
yorker on middle, punched back to the bowler
another one right in the block hole and Thisara can only push it back to the bowler. Terrific over from Sunny, only two runs and the big wicket of Sanga
low full toss on and around off stump, clipped to deep midwicket

outside edge, caught at short third man! Fuller delivery homing in on off stump and Thisara was looking for quick runs as he seeks the leg side boundary, but the ball skews away to Mahmudullah again who clings on to a simple chance. Bangladesh hitting back big time here, but is it too late?
excellent ball from Rubel. Yorker just outside off and Vithanage can only dig it out
brilliantly placed! Useful little slice past short third man. Another wide yorker, but Vithanage jams his bat down in time to place it past the diving Mahmudullah
full toss with ample room outside off, Vithanage makes room for himself and slaps it over mid-off. It wasn't too well timed but it was hit in the gap
yorker on off stump and he almost helicopters it back to the bowler. Loads of wristwork there as he digs it out
goes down the track to take this on the full and carves it into the covers
dropped at deep midwicket. It was a full toss on leg stump, Vithanage heaves it away. It was dying on Mominul, who should have come forward instead of focusing on just cutting the angle
drills to long-off as this is fired in full on off stump
yorker on middle and leg, Mathews can only whip it down to long-on
sees the batsman moving outside leg and Sunny darts it full and on the legs. Vithanage can't do anything about it as the ball wanders away towards square leg after striking his pads
goes back and chops the ball in front of point. This is an excellent spell of death bowling from Sunny, this is only his third ODI too!
full toss on middle and off, Mathews hacks it away wide of long-on to raise his fifty. He started the charge and is seeing it through for his team
finds the same gap even though this was a slower ball on middle. Mathews had cleared his front leg and heaves it away. Picked the slower delivery and punishes it
fullish and just outside off, Mathews slogs it to long-on
second drop from Mominul. This time he was at cover as Vithanage gets a thick outside edge while looking to smack a fullish delivery out of the park
fullish on off stump, Mathews finds deep midwicket and will remain unbeaten, unless there is a run-out
length ball on the stumps, Vithanage pulls to deep midwicket for a single

inn2.comm: back of a length just outside off, defended into the off side. But wait, he's overstepped! Rare lack of discipline from Malinga
length ball on off stump, Anamul clears his front leg and heaves. Gets an outside edge which sails into the hands of Mendis at deep third man. It was a free-hit though so he won't be out
that's more like Malinga. Rips this across the outside edge of Shamsur's defensive poke. This was too good as it pitched on middle and jagged away to square him up
blocked into the covers as this is back of a length on off stump

and just as I type that, Shamsur guides one to the second slip! Another awayswinger again and Shamur was lured into fishing outside his off stump. Regulation edge goes low and to his left, Senanayake, who is nicknamed Jonty, dives and clings on to a very sharp chance.
yorker on off stump, and it was swinging in at him. Mominul was watchful as he jams his bat down in time
back of a length on and around off stump, defended
probes away just outside off as he dabs it into the covers off the back foot
fullish on middle, stays in line and blocks
full and tailing in at him, Anamul uses the movement to nudge it behind square leg
good length ball on off stump, defended safely
outside edge, but it goes wide of the cordon. Excellent length and line from Mathews had the batsman in a bit of bother.
pushes it across the left-hander and Mominul shoulders arms. Probing over from Mathews
shortish on middle, Anamul is on the back foot as he defends and keeps it down
another short ball, right over middle again. Analmul ducks under it
good length ball on off stump which straightens just enough to square him up. Anamul however manages to defend quite well
fullish and it curves away, Anamul lets it go carefully.
length ball searching for the top of off, Anamul sees the shape away and gets in line
fullish and outside off, leaves it alone
fullish and outside off, Mominul won't bite
cuts it strongly, but it falls just a few inches short of point. Chandimal was the man there and he was coming forward, but had his body behind it to keep it to a dot
back of a length and angling outside off stump, Mominul wanted to slap it through point again. Beaten.
back of a length on middle and leg, clipped away to midwicket
shortish with a little bit of room as Mominul's balance is on the back foot and carves it to deep third man
shuffles across on off stump and whips this length ball on middle to long leg
fullish and seams away, Anamul strides forward and leaves
fullish and just outside off, Anamul isn't too keen to move forward as he dabs at this from the crease and into the off side
good length ball, with a hint of shape away. Anamul defends from the crease
short ball on off stump, Anamul wants nothing to do with it
digs it in on middle, Anamul ducks under
fullish and curving away outside off, Anamul defends into the covers off the back foot
a bit of room outside off and Mominul presents a straight bat as he punches through extra cover. Good balance on the back foot as he concentrated on finding the gap
fuller and playing on the angle outside off, flirts with it on the front foot and misses. Terrible shot
defends this back of a good length ball on the channel, gets a thick outside edge to deep third man
width outside off and he carves it away through point. A powerful whip of the wrists to place it in the gap and power it away
just short of a good length and angled into off stump, Anamul pushes to mid-off
punched to point as he opens the face to negotiate this good length ball outside off
back of a length and in the off stump corridor, Mominul punches into the covers
shortish just a shade outside off, Mominul tries to get on top of the bounce as he pushes into the covers
tucks him up on middle and Mominul was looking to nudge it through midwicket. The bat face turns on impact with the shortish ball and falls by his feet
charges him and goes through with the slog. He has not timed this at all, but beats mid-on and it dribbles away to the boundary rope. Had to drag a fuller delivery from outside off
makes a bit of room and pummels this back of a length ball straight over the top of Malinga. This was far better controlled

slower full toss on middle and leg, Anamul shuffles across and clips it behind square leg and has timed it well enough. Three consecutive boundaries. One one ball had been scored off Malinga previous to this over
fullish and outside off, Mominul allows it passage to the keeper
defended back to the bowler with a dead straight bat
chips down the track and punches this length ball into the covers. They need to find a few singles here
fullish and just outside off, Mominul is forward as he pushes into the covers
goes down the track and picks this off his pads. The fielder dived too early and the ball beats him into the square leg boundary. Vithanage was the culprit there
back of a length on off stump, dabbed behind square on the off side. Senanayake hunts this down from slip, misfields, but they don't want to risk it
good length ball, moving a touch away from him. Defended off the back foot
goes on with the arm without turning, Anamul went back and punched to point. Mendis is the man who sends in a wide throw at the non-strikers' to gift an overthrow

raced down the track and gets a very thick edge to first slip, but Mathews drops it. He might not have been expecting that to come to him, much less at head high, but he should have taken that after getting two hands to it
flighted outside off and Anamul is all over this. Went forward and laces this in front of point
this time he is clueless. No movement of the feet as this length ball turns in sharply and takes the inside edge
defended towards midwicket off the back foot
length ball down the leg side, Mominul wanted to pick it away behind square but it was too far away from him
shortish and just outside off, Mominul slaps it straight to point. Sri Lanka have plugged off his favourite area and it's piling loads of pressure on him
fuller on off stump, goes for a flick without too much foot movement and gets an inside edge onto pad. The appeal dies very early
too full and too straight, that was the release he wanted. Clipped away to deep backwards square leg
good length ball outside off, punched off the front foot to short cover
shortish and just outside off, opened the face and guides it to point
last ball of the mandatory powerplay is slapped over the top and sent packing to the long-off boundary. Authoritative strike from Anamul as he dismisses this length ball outside off
tossed up outside off as he drags Mominul across to drive into the covers
shortish and it turns away, Mominul rocks back and cuts strongly to deep point
slower and tossed up outside off, Mominul was forward and pushes to short cover
turn and bounce for Senanayake! Goes for a sweep, but this was too full and too close to off stump. Rips right across him after pitching and the keeper collects around shoulder-height
drilled into the covers as this is tossed up outside off
pitched on middle and turns to strike his pads and wander away towards fine leg
back of a length outside off, Anamul opens the face to guide this in front of point, who dives but only parries it away
shortish on middle and off, Mominul is on the back foot and pulls to deep midwicket
smokes this through extra. Got on top of the bounce and another whip of the wrists ensures this has enough power to beat the diving short cover. Top shot to bring up the fifty partnership
slower short ball on off stump, goes back and waits on it before pulling it in front of midwicket
back of a length on off stump, he shuffles across and tucks it through midwicket
good length ball just outside off, Mominul's feet are static as he throws his bat at this. Inside edge back to the bowler
bit of turn and bounce as Anamul shuffles across and tucks it away, just a touch to the left of the man under the helmet

edged and taken by Sanga, what a ball! what a take! Tossed up and lured him forward and out of his crease. His balance was totally shot and Mominul was looking to play against the turn as he closes the face of the bat and the outside edge is substantial, but Sanga moves fluidly to his left behind the stumps and takes a lovely grab
stays on the back foot as he guides this length ball outside off towards third man
flighted on middle as he goes back and turns it to short leg
just a bit too short that time and Anamul flicks it away to deep midwicket.
flighted on off stump, draws him forward to defend. Lovely over from Senanayake, great flight and extracted good turn and bounce off this surface
back of a length on off stump, Anamul whips it through midwicket
back of a length with a bit of cut away, Mushi was on the back foot and gets a bit of an outside edge to deep third man
short and wide outside off, Anamul's feet moved after he had played the cut shot which was probably why he didn't connect
full and on middle, clippped away to deep midwicket
waits for this back of a length ball to reach him and worked it to long leg. He's getting those singles

plays across a straight ball, which came back in just enough and is struck in front of off stump! Think that might have kept low and he was up on his toes trying to flick it through square leg. Poor shot selection sees him forsake another good start
flighted outside off, Mushi lunges forward and gets an outside edge to third man
gorgeous flight on off stump as Shakib is forward and opens the face to point
comes forward to the tossed up delivery on off stump and guide this into the covers
angles this in on middle and gets it to turn away, Shakib was pressing forward to defend and gets a thick outside edge
touch short and Shakib is far more comfortable cutting this away behind square
turns in off a length, but Mushi was expecting that as he makes room outside leg and dabs it to deep point
back of a length on off stump, stands up tall and dabs it at his feet
amazing shot! Planted his front foot outside off and dragged this length ball over the square leg boundary. Thisara's slower pace sets this up and this is creamed away
follows it with a half-hearted hook. A top edge manifests as he enjoys a four right over the keeper's head. Short ball outside off, shouldn't have looking to play that shot at all
inside edges it to the keeper as this is on a length and outside off. Looks to cut but doesn't time it at all
short and wide outside off, Mushi tries his best to reach it but there was no way
full and on the pads, Mushi glances it fine to the boundary. Poor line from the bowler and he's been punished for it with consummate ease
fullish on off stump, defended towards mid-on. Mushi wanted the single but Shakib wasn't so keen
fuller on middle, Shakib goes down on one knee outside off and sweeps towards deep backwards square leg

tossed up just outside off and Shakib pushes with an open face into the covers. If that had turned sharper, it might have resulted in the outside edge. I love how he's luring the batsmen to lunge away from the body
bounce off a length as Mushi gloves it behind the short leg fielder. Tossed up on off stump and lures Mushi forward. Plays with hard hands as this lobs up but lands safely
flighted on off stump, a lot more compact with his forward defence
looks to lap it away quite fine, but Senanayake pulls his length back a touch. Single to short fine leg
flighted on off stump, driven to mid-off and that is drinks
good length ball just outside off, chopped to third man
charges down the track and swings for all he's worth, but his head was falling all over the place. Poor shot considering the situation as he is beaten by a length ball outside off
back of a length on off stump, steered to deep third man as he plays far more close to the body
big appeal, but this was sliding down leg and there was also a nick, says umpire Rod Tucker and he's right. Wanted to whip it away through square leg

shortish and outside off, Shakib pulls hard and would have had his heart in his mouth as Vithanage timed his jump very well and gets two hands to it, but it was hit too powerfully for him to hold on. Terrific effort from the fielder, just fell short of pulling off a blinder
clips the length ball away behind square leg
legspinner first ball as it pitches on a length outside off and turns away, Mushi was making room and had to adjust as he dabs it down the pitch
pushes it down to long-on as this is shortish and a shade outside off
flights it outside off and Shakib comes forward and drives through into the covers
tossed up nicely on middle and leg, Mushi lap sweeps it behind it. Goes up in the air as he gets more of a leading edge
turns it away and he didn't pick it. Was looking to whip it through midwicket and gets a leading edge through the coveres

flighted on middle and leg and he has struck him on the pads! Shakib can't pick the one coming into him either. Played down the wrong line as he defends. Big appeal from Mendis, but that would have gone down leg
length ball on off stump, chopped away to point
goes for a wild heave off a length ball outside off and has shaved this off the outside edge to deep cover
good length on middle and leg, clipped away to long leg to bring up the Bangladesh hundred
that is massive! Carted this away over the square leg boundary as this time he picks the right ball. It was on a length and he unleashes a full swing of the bat
another length ball with a bit of room outside off. He had the umpire ducking for cover as he pulverises this down the ground

another one straight down the ground! Charges him and the bowler does his best to push it wider and beat his batswing. No such luck as Shakib gets it on the toe and the ball bounces a couple of times before hitting the rope
wanted to go for another sweep, doesn't connect
good length ball turning in at him, Mushi seems to have picked it and nudges it to long leg
tossed up on off stump, defended off the front foot
charges down the track, but Mendis has directed this flighted delivery down the leg side to cramp him up. Can only defend
another little foray down the track, this time the ball is pulled short and Shakib dabs into the covers with an open face
legspinner on middle and it turns away appreciably too. Nudged into midwicket and Mendis himself reaches it and presents a throw to third man under the pressure of Mushi wanting a single
flighted and just outside off as he charges him and hits back to the new bowler, Priyanjan

holes out at long-off and Shakib is furious with himself. It was an innocuous delivery, tossed up outside off. He just couldn't hold himself back, charges down the track and lofts it straight into the hands of Senanayake. Falling to a part-timer at this stage of the game, that's terrible!
leaps off a good length as Nasire was going forward to defend. Hits him on the glove but goes down
shortish as he goes back and cuts through the covers. Made good room for himself there to make the shot possible
bit of confusion between the two batsmen as this is tossed up and defended into the off side. Finally they decide against the single
opens the face and steers this in front of point and this time goes through for the single
flighted on off stump, defended into the covers. No single there Mushi
flighted on off stump, defended with an open face to point
flighted and outside off stump, not the right line to go for the lap sweep. Gets a top edge which flies over the head of the keeper
flighted outside off, think it was the googly there. Nasir goes for it and gets an inside edge down the ground to long-on
stays back in his crease and turns this length ball into midwicket
flighted on middle and off, whipped to long-on
shortish and outside off, cut away just in front of point who dives and stops the single. One batsman wanted it the other didn't
turns quite sharply in from outside off, he was looking to dab it to third man but can't get any wood on it. Beats the keeper too. Big turn and that missed off stump by a whisker too!
length ball, clipped into midwicket
keeps it nice and tight on the stumps, Nasir goes back and blocks
goes deep in his crease and opens the face of the bat to pick up a single between point and cover
skips down the track to reach the pitch and drives to mid-off, who is rather deep in the circle and they sneak the single
cut to point as this is on a length with a bit of room outside off. Picked the leg break
punched through the covers as he stands up tall to this shortish ball outside off
stays back and slaps it through the covers again. The man in the deep his a distance to run to his left and they take a couple
tossed up outside off, Nasir is lured to drive away from his body and gets a thick outside edge to backward point
slides down the leg side and this turns in. Clipped to long leg.
laps it nicely to deep fine leg. Fuller delivery down the leg side facilitates the shot
neatly whipped away off the back foot as this is on a length on middle and leg
turned around to the short fine leg fielder again as this is flighted on off stump
tossed up outside off, Nasir is far forward and blocks
goes down the track and chips the flighted ball on off stump to long-on
down the track and worked to midwicket. Checks his stroke after seeing he wasn't to the pitch
another little trek down the wicket from Mushi as he works this a lot squarer

flighted on off stump as he dabs into the covers. Nasir wanted the single and he was bolting. It is a direct hit, but the call of no came early enough and he also invested in a full-length dive which saves him. Good work from Senanayake. Bangladesh are not doing too well against him, are they?
too straight as he clips to deep midwicket
that's massive! Straight over the top! He raced down the pitch having seen this tossed up and unleashed a full swing of his bat. Got it right off the middle and he holds the pose
shortish and outside off, Nasir was waiting for that as he taps it through to deep point
Mushi follows suit with hte same shot
shortish and just outside off, cut to point
good length ball, turning in at him as Mushi works it through square leg
dabs it with an open face to short third man. Just enough width but he was looking to beat that man
flighted on off stump, chips down the track and defends into the on side. Didn't reach the pitch there
carved to short third man, who misfields
shortish and just outside off, Mushi goes back and outside leg to cut behind point
darts it on middle and off, Nasir flicks it away to deep square leg
gets a very thick edge which runs away to the third man boundary. He wasn't looking to place it as fine as that, but they all count. Bit more bounce on that than he expected
flighted on middle and leg, nudged into midwicket

straight to deep midwicket! That is the softest of dismissals. Flighted on middle and leg, he clears his front hip and heaves it away. But there is a man in the deep and he swallows it quite easily. Nasir is distraught, his captain at the other end is even more so. This is terrible batting from Bangladesh. They need partnerships, not big hits
flighted just outside off, lunges forward and drives into the covers
flighted just outside off, defended off a thick outside edge
tossed up outside off, reaches out and drives to mid-off
stays back in his crease to work this length ball to short fine leg
nicely tossed up on off stump, defended off the front foot and they scamper through for a single into the covers

Mahmudullah is gone run-out now! Bangladesh are imploding! Mushi took a few steps forward and then decides no and has sold his partner down the river. Flighted ball on middle and leg, turned behind square. Short fine leg is incredibly quick to the ball and sends a good flat throw to the bowler, who takes off the bails. Mahmudullah had given up, that was how far he had charged out
slogged over midwicket as he goes down the track to meet the pitch of this tossed up ball on middle and leg
flighted on off stump, Sohag Gazi, the new batsman, goes back in his crease and blocks
flighted on off stump, drives off the front foot to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, clipped through midwicket
flighted just outside off as he goes forward to block
turns outside off and bounces just a bit more than he expects as he misses a cut
chops it behind point as this has a bit of room outside off
dabbed away in front of point, gets a bit more bounce this time too, but Mushi rode it and seemed to have placed it well too until Senanayake dove full length and stops it
turned away through midwicket to retain strike
starts off on a leg-stump line. Clips the good length ball through square leg
back of a length on leg stump, stands up tall and defends into the leg side
eased away off his hips for a couple. Seems to still be working on getting his radar right
back of a length on middle, Gazi defends off the back foot
length ball on off stump, dabbed away to deep third man with an open face.
cut, but it goes straight to point and the required run-rate inches over 7
back of a length and just outside off, steered to deep third man
slower short ball, he drags it from outside off and pulls to deep square leg
length ball on off stump, opens the face and guides it to point, who dives to his left and keeps it to nonw. Senanayake again
gets this to go a lot finer and deep third man tidies up. Length ball, steered away
back of a length, blocked towards point. No single there
fifty to the Bangladesh captain as Mushi swings this away to the fine leg boundary. It was a length ball and he planted his front leg on off stump and swings around his front pad! Terrific shot!

he's guided it straight into the hands of the keeper! Sanga picks up a good low catch. He was looking to guide the length ball to third man but gets too fine an edge. There was a little question about whether it carried or not, but Sanga claimed the catch and he is right. It did not bounce
shortish and just outside off, gains good height as Mortaza sways inside the line
another one dug in on middle and leg, Mashrafe stays leg side of it and opens the face towards point
despite his limit in pace, Thisara digs this into the middle of the pitch and gets it to rise around the batsman's chest. Mashrafe stays leg side of it and dabs to point
guided to point as he hangs his bat out to the shortish ball just outside off
this time he ducks under a short ball, but it was directed down the leg side
shortish and has a bit of room outside off, Mashrafe makes a very late decision to dab it to third man. Goes in the air, but there wasn't any danger as he had hit behind point
bouncer from Mathews this time, Mashrafe looks to pull but he cannot connect. Seemed too quick and too high for him
back of a length just outside off, inches forward and pushes into the covers
short again and just outside off, Mashrafe doesn't bother with it. Got pretty good height on it too
slower ball directed full and on off stump, Mashrafe has picked it and defends to short midwicket
the keeper's let this go as the slower, off cutter doesn't carry through. Mashrafe was poking at it and could well have edged it another day
this offcutter bounces a lot more and thuds into Mashrafe's defensive bat. Pulls his bottom hand away immediately, almost as if he got a shock. Looks like that is drinks
yorker on leg stump, clipped to deep square leg and good running gives them a couple

low full toss and Mushi's timed this wonderfully well. Great whip of the wrists and he's placed it to the right of midwicket. Wasn't looking to hit it too hard and that fetches him a charming little boundary
right up there just outside off stump, drilled to long-on

slower yorker with loads of dip! This struck him right in front of the stumps, but this came right off the inside edge. Not off the pads like Malinga thought. He is absolutely flabbergasted. But umpire Tucker has judged it perfectly
another slower full toss on off stump. Mashrafe manages to get his bat down in line. Wobbled away a touch there too
fullish on middle as he goes back to his full pace, kept out again
flighted outside off as he draws Mushi forward to defend
bounces off a length and strikes him on the grille! Mushi was lunging forward and looking to sweep as the ball takes his elbow and thuds into the helmet
turns in sharply as he goes for a cut on length, gets an inside edge
flighted outside off, but he goes back and pushes back down the pitch
more appreciable turn, but Mushi does well as he leaps outside leg and dabs it to short third man
big turn there too as Mashrafe is forward and tries to clip to fine leg. Sanga extends his left hand and it lobs away off his glove. What a tight over, only one run off it
fullish on leg stump, worked down towards long-on. Midwicket intervenes, but still can't stop the single. Required run-rate just above 8
terrific yorker on off stump, dug out to long-on
slides the yorker down the leg side and Mushi's annoyed he didn't get a tickle on that
yorker on middle! That's the perfect ball but Mushi moves outside leg to allow the bat to come down and protect his stumps
full toss on leg stump, Mushi's wrists take this over the deep backward square leg boundary. Whipped it away and this was timed beyond perfection
slower delivery, was the offcutter on the stumps. Mushi adjusts and blocks towards point.
low full toss on leg stump, pushes to long-on to retain strike
length ball just outside off, punched it to long-on
goes for the sweep as this is a length ball on off stump, gets a top edge over the keeper
this one turns away and he had not picked it. Looked to clip it to midwicket again and was looking for another cheeky single. Not available
skips down the track, but he is kept to a defensive as Senanayake pulls his length back
flighted outside off, Mushi goes down on one-knee and sweeps to deep square leg
goes for a reverse sweep, not quite the best short to attempt against a bowler who gets extra bounce. And he wears it on the helmet. Turn and bounce still for Senanayake, despite the dew
yorker on middle, Mushi whips it to long-on. Amazing wrists on this little fella. That was a helicopter, if I'm not mistaken

off cutter in the block hole and it strikes Mashrafe on the pads. Might have slid down leg there. He was looking for a single, forgetting that point had swooped in on the ball. Desperate dive wouldn't have saved him had that hit direct. The overthrow results in the single
what a strike! Almost a yorker, but he cleared his front leg and slammed it down the ground. Mashrafe was in danger there, before he ducked and let the ball clatter into the long-on boundary
slower ball on off stump, Mushi defends off the back foot and takes a couple of strides but the non-striker's not too keen

he's overbalanced and just evaded falling on his stumps! Went for the sweep and is completely deceived by the slower ball, gets hit on the body and he loses his footing as he got up and manages to sidestep the stumps as he falls over. Smiles from the batsman himself and the Dhaka crowd
yorker on off stump, whipped to long-on
pushes to long-on for a single
spins away from him as he goes for a massive heave over the leg side. Cannot connect
stays leg side of this and creams the length ball with the turn through the covers. These two are not giving up by a long shot
inside out and that has been slapped over cover! Mendis is being massacred here as Mashrafe moves outside leg, moves forward and gives it his all. Great power from the former captain

so he'll go over midwicket, but he cannot clear the man in the deep. The search for a big hit consumes another Bangladesh batsman. Picks up the one that turns into him and slogs wildly but all he manages to do is drop it down the throat of Thisara Perera
flighted on the pads, nudged away towards square leg
slower ball pushed through down the leg side, wided
great yorker on leg stump but Mushi's defence is strong indeed
shortish with a bit of room outside off, stays leg side and cuts it away to deep cover and takes the single. Sunny has four balls to face. He better be careful of his toes
very full on off stump, brings down an angled bat to steer it to point
full toss on off stump, whips it to mid-on from the crease
this one leaps off back of a length, but Sunny does well. Soft hands nudges it towards the leg side

the extra ball does the trick for Sri Lanka. Mushi's steered it straight to point! He had kept out so many good yorkers, but this time he was searching for a single to retain strike. Tried to guide it to the left of point, but Senanayake dives to his left and snares a good, low catch. MIght well be the end of Bangladesh's chase tonight. Terrific innings from their captain, if only he'd had a little support
tossed up but this slides down leg. The keeper can't collect it cleanly
goes back and punches to backward point
length ball with a bit of room outside off, Rubel goes down on one knee and slogs him over midwicket. Meaty strike
shuffles across and blocks the length ball outside off
bounce and turn this time cautions Rubel from going for a heave. Dabs it down the pitch
loads of flight and almost yorks him. Kept out though

that's it! Leading edge to cover and so Sri Lanka have swept the tour, winning the one-day series as well! Good length ball turning in on off stump, he had shuffled across to clip it through midwicket, but had closed the face too early and succumbs
